attractions.name: Historic Route 66 Museum
attractions.address: 120 W Andy Devine Ave, Kingman, AZ 86401
attractions.description: Explore the fascinating history of the Mother Road with vintage cars, photographs, and memorabilia spanning Route 66's golden age.

attractions.name: Mohave Museum of History & Arts
attractions.description: Discover local Native American artifacts, mining history, and territorial period exhibits showcasing Kingman's rich cultural heritage.

attractions.name: Locomotive Park
attractions.address: 330 E Andy Devine Ave, Kingman, AZ 86401
attractions.description: Family-friendly park featuring a restored 1928 Santa Fe locomotive, playground equipment, and picnic areas perfect for community gatherings.

attractions.name: Hualapai Mountain Park
attractions.description: Escape to cooler temperatures in this mountain retreat offering hiking trails, camping, and stunning views of the surrounding desert.

attractions.name: Kingman Railroad Depot
attractions.address: 402 E Andy Devine Ave, Kingman, AZ 86401
attractions.description: Historic depot serving as a visitor center with railroad artifacts, local tourism information, and Route 66 memorabilia.

attractions.name: Bonelli House
attractions.description: Victorian-era home turned museum showcasing 1890s frontier life with period furnishings and guided tours available.

attractions.name: Kingman Area Chamber of Commerce
attractions.address: 120 W Andy Devine Ave, Kingman, AZ 86401
attractions.description: Your gateway to local business connections, community events, and economic development opportunities in the Kingman region.

attractions.name: Centennial Park
attractions.description: Modern recreational facility with sports fields, walking trails, splash pad, and event spaces for community celebrations and activities.
